Dialogue.Page: This is a strange, ancient metal plate found in the river in a grove near the village.

Its origins are unknown; it is clearly not Nomai or Hearthian. Was there yet another civilization on Timber Hearth at one point? Unfortunately, this is the only trace of said civilization that has ever been found.
The carving on the plate depicts our solar system and what seems to be our nearest system, Hearth's Neighbor. Could it have come from all the way over there?
We long believed we would never know the answer, but due to recent Outer Wilds Ventures ships being equipped with a warp drive, this mystery may actually be solved one day!
